long_description: Offering solid performance for aggressive trail rides, the Scott Spark 29er 960 is your entree into the fast-rolling, bump-absorbing world of full-suspension mountain bikes with 29 in. wheels. Hydroformed and butted 6061 aluminum frame is lightweight and sturdy; geometry has been fine-tuned to maximize suspension performance. RockShox XC 30 TK 29 suspension fork has 100mm of travel to smooth out trails and enhance handling. X-Fusion 02 RL rear shock with lockout offers improved traction and bump control. Shimano drivetrain uses SLX derailleurs guided by Alivio shifters, which provide responsive shifting throughout the 27 gear combinations. Shimano hydraulic disc brakes use a 180mm rotor up front and a 160mm rotor in back to facilitate responsive braking. 29er wheels are outfitted with Schwalbe Rocket Ron tires, offering great all-around performance with excellent traction. Specs on the Scott Spark 960 29er full-suspension mountain bike are subject to change.
